item.title: Tips for Data Collection & Organization
item.description: As I’ve stated many times, my research sits at the juncture of public policy, statistics, and data science. More specifically, I study elite texts and policy documents quantitatively. From early on in my academic career, -experience and qualifications -connect to teaching statistics -importance of data collection -who is this for The Origin & Life of Data Record, Don’t Calculate -names _ .
